Title: Relates to issuance of keepsake plates for gold star mothers
Summary: Relates to distinctive license plates issued to gold star mothers; permits gold star mothers to retain one keepsake plate as a commemorative item after distinctive plates are surrendered.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-i, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to keepsake plates for gold star mothers
